title: A Triple-Bogey Start Vanquished, Rory McIlroy Captures the FedEx Cup
description: McIlroy edged out Scottie Scheffler, who had held the lead in Atlanta for almost the entire Tour Championship. Sungjae Im and Scheffler finished tied for second, a stroke behind.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder
media:description: Rory McIlroy lifted the FedEx Cup trophy after winning in the final round of the Tour Championship on Sunday.
